Articles.Content: For the last week I've been on vacation to see my aunt and uncle in Montana. I just got home from a day of travelling, and now at last sitting here at my computer again I feel like I've been living in complete darkness. I haven't done anything KSP-related in the last eight days! Blasphemy! So guys, catch me up to speed here. What major things happened this last week?
Well, Jebediah farted, Bob lit it, and Bill, well poor Bill he got fried extra crispy.
I'd say, read the last devnote to get half of what's been happening

Spaceplane plus is going to be added in 0.25 (with a few unspecified changes), the Admin building model has been revealed (it's in the official section somewhere), there's a new Kerbal History thread in Forum Games, and SQUAD has undertaken a large mystery project.
and squad kicked butt on the devnote quality. obviously it cant be like that every time, but this last one was superb.
